title: Creeper Egg
summaries: The Creeper Egg is a Hardmode light pet-summoning item that summons a Flickerwick to follow the player around. When active, it is similar to the Wisp in a Bottle, where it provides light wherever the player goes. The summoned Flickerwick has the same movement speed as the player, and cannot be left behind easily. The Creeper Egg is dropped by Ogres during the Old One's Army event, with a 1/5 (20%) / 1/4 (25%) chance during Tier 2, and a 1/10 (10%) chance during Tier 3.

statistics.Tooltip: Summons a pet flickerwick to provide light
